level.text: Compliance filings affecting existing rates shall be filed with the Secretary of the Commission, the Office of the People’s Counsel, and each intervenor.
Service on the Office of the People’s Counsel and intervenors shall be on the same day the compliance filing is made with the Commission, where possible.

There shall be a period of five (5) days after the compliance filing is submitted to the Commission within which the Office of the People’s Counsel, staff, and intervenors may comment on the compliance filing.
The Commission shall not entertain motions for enlargement of time within which to comment on tariff compliance filings except upon a clear showing of extraordinary circumstances.
